data.title: “I will always hate you”! An investigation of the impact of anthropomorphism in online anti-brand communities
data.meta_description: “I will always hate you”! An investigation of the impact of anthropomorphism in online anti-brand communities - Author: Amélia Brandão, Paolo Popoli
